document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KEN/Kenya- Prodoc Emergency Response to flooding - Trac 3.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KEN/Project Document (Apr 2013 - Oct 2013) - Enhanced Coordination Capacity for Response and Recovery from Floods.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The project aimed at strengthening the government of Kenya capacity to coordinate and respond to the long rains floods impact in several parts of the country. The floods displaced over 100,000 people and resulted to about 90 deaths. The key objectives included floods impact assessment and formulation of floods recovery programme for Kenya.

project_descr: This project seeks to strengthen the government coordination mechanisms including assessment and intervention strategies
project_title: Enhanced Coordination Capacity for Response to Floods
